Develop a mobile app that uses AI technology to personalize workout plans based on the user's fitness level and goals. The app would track progress and provide real-time feedback to help users achieve their fitness objectives.

Create a mobile app that uses augmented reality to enhance the user's experience when shopping for furniture or decor. The app would allow users to visualize how different pieces would look in their home before making a purchase.
Develop a mobile app that uses blockchain technology to facilitate peer-to-peer lending. The app would allow users to lend and borrow money securely and transparently.

Create a mobile app that uses machine learning to predict and prevent equipment failures in industrial settings. The app would analyze data from sensors and provide real-time alerts to prevent downtime and reduce maintenance costs.

Develop a mobile app that uses virtual reality to provide immersive language learning experiences. The app would allow users to practice speaking and listening in realistic scenarios to improve their language skills.
